column1: * The Elves are unwilling to heed the summons of Oromë and leave Middle-earth for Aman. Therefore
column2: Oromë invites three chieftains to join him on a visit to Valinor: Ingwë

column1: * After speaking to the Valar and seeing the light of the Two Trees
column2: the three chieftains see the awe and splendour of Valinor.
